post:
Hello Low End Talk!

Today we are offering all members an exclusive plan (For your eyes only!)

Currently the plan is only available in Dallas, Texas hosted with Incero.

**Node specifications:**
Intel Xeon E5-2620 @ 2.0Ghz
32GB RAM
4x 1TB HW RAID10
1Gbit port

**Test file:**
[http://192.211.51.190/100mb.test](http://192.211.51.190/100mb.test)
You can also use the above IP address to test latency.

**Custom LET plan specification:**
2 Shared CPU cores
512MB RAM / 768MB Burstable RAM
35GB Disk space
500GB Bandwidth @ 100mbit
1IPv4 (More on request £1, maximum 2 extra)

The above plan is only £4.36 ($7), we are running discounts for long term orders:

Quarterly - 5% off - £12.45 ($19.95)
Semi-Annually - 10% off - £23.78 ($38.12)
Annually - 20% off - £43.60 ($69.89)

**System templates:**
CentOS 6 - 64bit & 32bit
Debian 6 - 64bit & 32bit
Ubuntu 11.04 - 64bit & 32bit
Ubuntu 11.10 - 64bit & 32bit

We are running OpenVZ with SolusVM Control panel

No need to use any coupon code, just click below to order this amazing plan!

[http://domvps.com/order/LEB-512-TX/](http://domvps.com/order/LEB-512-TX/)

We also offer many other great value plans, OpenVZ and KVM available at multiple locations.

[http://domvps.com/](http://domvps.com/)
[http://domvps.com/kvm](http://domvps.com/kvm)

If you have any questions, feel free to ask either in the comments or by submitting a support ticket.

Kind regards,
domVPS
